meta.review_title: Vodacom what happened to my data?
meta.review_content: I bought data from vodacom .Switched on mobile data and no connection .Call the helpline ,the vodacom service bot says I should restart , after restarting I still can't connect .Numerous calls and exchanges with vodacom service bot and still can't use the data and it's says I have 0mb .Vodacom where did my data go ?
